title.narrative: EDUCATION:QUALITY SOCIAL SERVICES WITH EQUITY

description.narrative: By 2016, social services promoting social well-being of children by addressing identified deprivations and by improving supply, quality demand and enabling environment in Stann Creek, Belize and Toledo Districts, which contributes to Early Learning, Education In Emergencies, Learning And Child-Friendly Schools, Learning Outcomes, Sanitation, Wash In Schools And Ecd Centres. UNICEF aims to achieve this through Advocacy And Public Engagement, Developing And Leveraging Resources And Partnerships, Systems Strengthening And Institution Building. This contributes to the following Country Programme result: By the end of 2016, most excluded boys and girls in Toledo, Stann Creek, and Belize South Side are reached by policies and programmes with a gender perspective that increases protection, early childhood development, culturally-appropriate and child- friendly education and learning opportunities, across the lifecycle 0-18 including during periods of emergency

participating-org.narrative: GOVERNMENT OF BELIZE MINISTRY OF HE AND WELLNESS
MINISTRY OF HOME AFFAIRS AND NEW GROWTH INDUSTRIES
MINISTRY OF YOUTH SPORTS AND E GOVERNANCE

description.narrative: Success in key developmental initiatives were prioritized through advocacy, empowerment and by strengthening the capabilities of partners in ensuring provision of quality social services in early childhood development and education. | Status:On-track | As-of Date:12/01/2017
